description: Urban living in this modern 3 bed, 2 bath townhome by EDGESTONE!  6 years young, w/ balance of 10 year NHW.  Updated features & hardware throughout. Bright open-plan kitchen with over-height ceilings, large quartz island & countertops, gas range, & sleek cabinetry.  Upstairs offers 3 spacious bedrooms, primary with radiant in-floor heating & under-vanity lighting.  Parking isn't an issue, with street side parking & large tandem GARAGE- providing bonus of excellent storage for all the toys, think bikes, kayaks & more, & new durable epoxy flooring recently installed. Well run & pro-active strata w/ low fees, & family friendly community. Commuting options ideal here with Barnet Hy 1 blk away, close to WCE, Rocky Point Park, schools, shopping & legendary Brewers Row!
